PATIENT_ID: TEST_VASC_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-21 14:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-21 14:10:00
Category I activation for 45-year-old male, motorcycle crash.
Active hemorrhage from left lower extremity. Tourniquet applied in field.
BP 88/60, HR 120, RR 24. Hemodynamically unstable.
Blood transfusion initiated with emergency-release PRBCs.

[IMAGING] 2026-01-21 14:35:00
CT angiography left lower extremity: Active arterial extravasation from
left superficial femoral artery. Pseudoaneurysm identified.
Angioembolizable lesion confirmed.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-21 14:50:00
Trauma Vascular Emergency activated. Category A designation.
IR consulted. Angioembolization performed successfully.
BP improved to 110/72 after embolization. HR decreased to 92.
Repeat BP confirms hemodynamic stability: 118/76.
